<li id="cite_note-316"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-316">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Ogawa, Naohiro. <a class="external text" href="http://www.mofa.go.jp/j_info/japan/socsec/ogawa.html" rel="nofollow">Demographic Trends and their implications for Japan's future</a>. <li id="cite_note-317"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-317">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://www2s.biglobe.ne.jp/~kobayasi/area/population/popu_1.htm" rel="nofollow">日本の人口と人口問題</a>. <li id="cite_note-390"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-390">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130101044401/http://www.nhk.or.jp/strl/aboutstrl/evolution-of-tv-en/p07/column/index1.html" rel="nofollow"><span style="padding-left:0.2em;">"</span>Can you see me clearly?" 2009-04-27 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-11-15</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210324140540/https://www.j-cast.com/2009/04/27040273.html?p=all" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-03-24）.</cite><span class="Z3988" <li id="cite_note-Batt2014-436"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Batt2014_436-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Carl A. </li>
<li id="cite_note-BoultonQuain2013-437"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-BoultonQuain2013_437-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Christopher Boulton; David Quain. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=QpDVsu-vaBcC&amp;pg=PAPT20" rel="nofollow">Brewing Yeast and Fermentation</a>. John Wiley &amp; Sons. 2013: 20–. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1-118-68534-1" title="Special:网络书源/978-1-118-68534-1"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1-118-68534-1</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.au=Christopher+Boulton&amp;rft.au=David+Quain&amp;rft.btitle=Brewing+Yeast+and+Fermentation&amp;rft.date=2013&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-118-68534-1&amp;rft.pages=20-&amp;rft.pub=John+Wiley+%26+Sons&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DQpDVsu-vaBcC%26pg%3DPAPT20&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-438"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-438">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130116212751/http://www.tjf.or.jp/eng/content/japaneseculture/pdf/ge09shun.pdf" rel="nofollow"><span style="padding-left:0.2em;">"</span>A Day in the Life: Seasonal Foods," The Japan Forum Newsletter No.14</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 1999-09 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2013-12-10</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.tjf.or.jp/eng/content/japaneseculture/pdf/ge09shun.pdf" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>存档于2013-01-16）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.btitle=%22A+Day+in+the+Life%3A+Seasonal+Foods%2C%22+The+Japan+Forum+Newsletter+No.14&amp;rft.date=1999-09&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tjf.or.jp%2Feng%2Fcontent%2Fjapaneseculture%2Fpdf%2Fge09shun.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-439"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-439">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://hk.apple.nextmedia.com/international/first/20131206/18538623" rel="nofollow">體現四季分明　日人尊重自然 和食列非物質遺產</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E8%98%8B%E6%9E%9C%E6%97%A5%E5%A0%B1_(%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF)" title="蘋果日報 (香港)">蘋果日報</a>. 2013-12-06 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2013-12-10</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20170315085038/http://hk.apple.nextmedia.com/international/first/20131206/18538623" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2017-03-15）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.btitle=%E9%AB%94%E7%8F%BE%E5%9B%9B%E5%AD%A3%E5%88%86%E6%98%8E%E3%80%80%E6%97%A5%E4%BA%BA%E5%B0%8A%E9%87%8D%E8%87%AA%E7%84%B6+%E5%92%8C%E9%A3%9F%E5%88%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%89%A9%E8%B3%AA%E9%81%BA%E7%94%A2&amp;rft.date=2013-12-06&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E8%98%8B%E6%9E%9C%E6%97%A5%E5%A0%B1&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fhk.apple.nextmedia.com%2Finternational%2Ffirst%2F20131206%2F18538623&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
</ol></div>
<h2><span id=".E5.BB.B6.E4.BC.B8.E9.96.B1.E8.AE.80"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="延伸閱讀">延伸閱讀</span></h2>
<p><span class="mw-editsection-like plainlinks" style="float: right;"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a class="extiw" href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q17" title="wikidata:Q17"><span class="nomobile">在维基数据</span>编<span class="nomobile">辑</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span>
</p>
<dl><dd><img alt="维基文库中的相关文本：" class="noviewer" data-file-height="430" data-file-width="410" decoding="async" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Wikisource-logo.svg/15px-Wikisource-logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Wikisource-logo.svg/23px-Wikisource-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Wikisource-logo.svg/30px-Wikisource-logo.svg.png 2x" title="维基文库" width="15"/> 《<a class="extiw" href="https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/%E6%AC%BD%E5%AE%9A%E5%8F%A4%E4%BB%8A%E5%9C%96%E6%9B%B8%E9%9B%86%E6%88%90/%E6%96%B9%E8%BC%BF%E5%BD%99%E7%B7%A8/%E9%82%8A%E8%A3%94%E5%85%B8/%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E9%83%A8" title="s:欽定古今圖書集成/方輿彙編/邊裔典/日本部">欽定古今圖書集成·方輿彙編·邊裔典·日本部</a>》，出自<a href="/wiki/%E9%99%88%E6%A2%A6%E9%9B%B7" title="陈梦雷">陈梦雷</a>《<a href="/wiki/%E5%8F%A4%E4%BB%8A%E5%9B%BE%E4%B9%A6%E9%9B%86%E6%88%90" title="古今图书集成">古今圖書集成</a>》</dd></dl>

<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.mofa.go.jp/mofaj/" rel="nofollow">外務省</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210325155415/http://www.mofa.go.jp/mofaj/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.shugiin.go.jp/index.nsf/html/index.htm" rel="nofollow">眾議院</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20140321202355/http://www.shugiin.go.jp/index.nsf/html/index.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.ndl.go.jp/" rel="nofollow">國會圖書館</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20070430161016/http://www.ndl.go.jp/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li></ul>

style="padding:2px"><table cellspacing="0" class="nowraplinks collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:G8" title="Template:G8"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;" title="查看该模板">查</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:G8" title="Template talk:G8"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;" title="讨论该模板">论</abbr></a></li><li title="编辑该模板">编</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div style="font-size:110%"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%B8%83%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2" title="七国集团">七国集团</a>（G7）／<a class="mw-redirect" <ul><li><small>1. 香港最初是以「<a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF" title="香港">香港</a>（Hong Kong）」名义加入，直至1997年7月1日<a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E5%9B%9E%E6%AD%B8" title="香港回歸">香港主權移交</a>後改用「中國香港（Hong Kong, China）」<br/>2. <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E6%B0%91%E5%9C%8B" title="中華民國">中華民國</a>以「<a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E8%87%BA%E5%8C%97" title="中華臺北">中華臺北</a>（Chinese Taipei）」名义加入</small></li></ul>
